projects.name: Photo Exhibiter
projects.technologies: ASP.NET Core 2.0, EF Core 2.0, Identity Framework, Bootstrap 4
projects.description:
A social network for photographers written with a CQRS/DDD inspired architecture.

Functionality:

  • browse unexpired exhibits
  • post/edit/cancel(soft delete)/search exhibits
  • attend/unattend exhibits
  • notifications (when someone cancels or changes an exhibit)

projects.name: Rollei Shop
projects.technologies: ASP.NET Core 2.0, EF Core 2.0, Identity Framework, Semantic UI
projects.description:
An ecommerce shop written with a CQRS/DDD inspired architecture.

Functionality:

  • browse product catalog
  • manage product catalog (admin feature)
  • manage shopping cart
  • checkout order
  • browse order history

projects.name: Dapper University
projects.description:
The wonderful Contoso University sample project written in dapper (and Spectre for UI).

Functionality:

  • manage students
  • manage instructors
  • manage courses
  • manage departments

All features are complete except for instructor course assignments and filter/sort/paging (on my TODO list). I also have plans to add identity(using dapper in lieu of entity) for authentication.

projects.name: DevConf (In Progress)
projects.description: An in-progress, service-oriented conference planning app. An MVC project powered by a restful API project.
